about_the_game:
Party Management exists in a fantasy world of the contemporary age. Mighty warriors and mystical wizards now adorn streetwear and star in movies. Adventuring is a common pass time, but to do it you must be licensed under a party manager. This is where you come in. Select and manage up to 7 unique party members for each puzzle and use their abilities to guide them on a treacherous adventure into the golden city of Opulence in hopes of striking it rich, quitting their 9-5’s, and following their dreams.

Features:

  • Unique RPG Themed Puzzling Mechanics

  • Solve 20 trials across 4 areas

  • Expand your party and take on harder challenges

  • Chart the world around you through Ava’s Log

  • Master 7 unique abilities across your party

  • Discover the secrets of Opulence and Confluence

  • Replay your favorite trials with an expanded party to find new solutions

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or Greater
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3/Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 1060
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or Greater
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5/Intel i5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 1060 or Greater
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Take control of Ava, a rookie party manager tasked with guiding a group of novice adventurers to their first success, but when the group gets out of hand and the odds start stacking up against the party, will it be too much to manage?
